_sText:
This is a very HARD bunny hop map, so only exellent bhoppers will be able to finish it.

The whole map is MP BHOP ( You can jump on the same block as many times as you want! ). Try to take advantage of this!

There are 8 levels :

1- Textures from thc_gold ( No ScreenShots )
2- Woods
3- Rocks ( Go up and up )
4- Dev. textures ( No ScreenShots )
5- Bricks and Sand
6- Concrete
7- Dark with blue lights ! ( Bhop on lights )
8- Metal with White 

Also there's a room for begginers ( to practise/learn bhop )

Beta version was tested by Blacky ( A bug was found but it has already been fixed in this version )

If you finish you'll hear a "HOLYSHIT" then a little music and you'll be able to get a jet bag or a scout with a smile :)

No bonus.

The map supports 18 terrorists.

There are â€œoptionalâ€ music at all levels ( Its starts soundless but you can start it if you want to).

I hope you enjoy it and improove your skills with those hard levels!

Please leave a comment, because i wanna know what's your opinion about the map!
You can also give me any suggestion or something ( Im not planning on doing another version but....who knows.. )

If you cannot download from gamebanana please use one of these links:    
http://www.sendspace.com/file/f3m9ix
http://rapidshare.com/files/446056997/bhop_whipz.rar
http://filebeam.com/80f5ecbe8552419f3919ab7a29bf97e5


And also check my previous production: Bhop_resistance_v3b:
http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/153520

Till next time !

~~~~~~~STAY~~~~~~~~
